duties_responsibilities.duty: Define position profiles and ideal candidate profiles in collaboration with hiring managers
Implement targeted outreach to attract qualified candidates using various platforms and networks
Screen and disseminate resumes, and develop a system to engage future qualified candidates
Conduct initial phone screenings and provide feedback to hiring managers
Arrange interview processes and committees, including preparation of committee members and interview techniques
Establish effective communication strategies to keep candidates and hiring managers informed of the recruitment process
Manage job offers, including salary negotiations and reference checks
Coordinate new hire enrollments and introductions to organizational culture, benefits, and policies
Conduct exit interviews and record associated data when needed

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or relevant field
